meanings.definition: The external opening of a reproductive gland or organ.
meanings.sent1: The gonopores on the fish allow for the release of eggs and sperm.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the gonopores of various animals to understand their reproductive systems.
meanings.sent3: The fish felt self-conscious about its gonopores being on full display during mating season.
meanings.sent4: The gonopores of the flower opened up to release its pollen into the air.
meanings.sent5: The veterinarian carefully examined the gonopores of the bird to check for any abnormalities.

meanings.definition: A pore through which reproductive cells are released.
meanings.sent1: The gonopores of the plant allowed for the dispersal of its seeds.
meanings.sent2: The tiny gonopores on the insect's body were essential for its reproduction.
meanings.sent3: The scientist marveled at the efficiency of the gonopores in nature's design.
meanings.sent4: The gonopores of the tree seemed like tiny portals to a new generation of plants.
meanings.sent5: The teacher explained to the students how the gonopores in animals help in the process of reproduction.
